docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Nov. 19--As the citizens of Uruguay prepare to go to the polls Sunday, the Presidency of that small country lies between Minister of Public Works Tomas Berreta of the democratic Colorado party and Luis Alberto de Herrera, leader of the extreme Rightist Herrerista party.

docs.snippet: LAKE SUCCESS, N.Y., Nov. 22 --The United Kingdom proposed today that the United Nations General Assembly declare genocide, the mass destruction of religious, racial or national groups, an international crime for which the principal perpetrators,...
docs.lead_paragraph: LAKE SUCCESS, N.Y., Nov. 22 --The United Kingdom proposed today that the United Nations General Assembly declare genocide, the mass destruction of religious, racial or national groups, an international crime for which the principal perpetrators, individuals and states might be held legally liable.
docs.abstract: Brit UN delegate submits amendment to Cuba, Panama and India resolution before Assembly's legal com, denouncing genocide as internatl crime and holding perpetrators as well as States responsible; Polish delegate sees need for implementation; other delegates approve; offer amendments
